caption.p: Inhibition of the activation of the RAW 264.7 cell line by the active compounds 1 (Comp. 1) and 2 (Comp. 2), in vitro. Cells were treated with different concentrations of compounds 1â€“ 2, oleanolic acid ( O.A.) and dexamethasone ( DEX), separately. Nitrite oxide concentrations in the culture supernatants were determined using a Griess reagent assay. Dexamethasone was used as the positive control.
